creator: Pablo Impallari
license_desciption: This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This license is available with a FAQ at: http://scripts.sil.org/OFL
description: Caveat is a handwriting type family designed by Pablo Impallari. It is designed for both short annotations and body text usage. For a different style, there is also a sister family, Caveat Brush The fonts have OpenType features that enable the letters to have slight variations according to their occurrence within a word, for a natural handwritten feel.
